attributes.additional_details:
As a FULLY voting  member of the British society I find it unbelievable that the House Of Commons MP'S are able to act like a bunch of RUDE , IGNORANT , SEXIST and totally IMMATURE SCHOOL BOYS when a member of the opposite sex questions the PM .

   I hereby petition   that the Prime Minister and the rest of the House of Commons  actually act as if they are grown ups RATHER than give this impressionable behaviour  to our young people , and  that this behaviour is acceptable in todays society ...

 WE ALL LEARN BY EXAMPLE ... TRY SHOWING ONE  HOUSE OF COMMONS AND ESPECIALLY YOU ..MR CAMERON AS A LEADER IS MEANT TO LEAD NOT BE IGNORANT , RUDE OR IMMATURE . How youngsters learn about todays acceptable society  is all our responsibilitys  this just shows a lack of responsibility from the head of our goverment .
